short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for automatically logging medical cases with the Accreditation Council for Graduate Medical Education (ACGME).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Case Logs is an extension for automatically logging medical cases with the Accreditation Council for Graduate Medical Education (ACGME). 

Directions:

1. Download your cases from your EMR. 
2. Log into the ACGME case log website
3. Verify the records if you'd like
4. Press submit and all records will be auto-uploaded!

Case Logs is currently available for surgical residents. Please email EfficienseeDev@gmail.com if you are interested in trying the app at your institution!
